FuncDef: The display ospfv3 routing command displays the OSPFv3 routing table. The display ospfv3 routing command displays the OSPFv3 routing table. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display ospfv3 [ <process-id> ] routing [ [ <ipv6-address> <prefix-length> ] | ase-routes | inter-routes | intra-routes | nssa-routes ] [ verbose ] [ age { min-value <min-age-value> | max-value <max-age-value> } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the OSPFv3 process ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies the IPv6 address.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Specifies the prefix length.
It is an integer ranging from 0 to 128.

Displays the statistics of OSPFv3 AS external routes.
-

Displays the statistics of OSPFv3 inter-area routes.
-

Displays the statistics of OSPFv3 intra-area routes.
-

Displays the statistics of OSPFv3 NSSA routes.
-

Displays detailed information about OSPFv3 routes.
-

Displays the LSAs that age in the scope.
-

Displays OSPFv3 routing table information with the aging time greater than or equal to min-age-value.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

Displays OSPFv3 routing table information with the aging time less than or equal to max-age-value.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

Displays all routes in the OSPFv3 routing table.
-
